formattedAddress: 240 Central Park S #1P, New York, NY 10019, USA
adrFormatAddress: 240 Central Park S #1P, New York, NY 10019, USA

originalText.text: Extremely delinquent. Radjabi neglected to give me life-changing genetic results for over 4 months after he received the report. After many months of waiting, I finally asked him to acknowledge his mistake. His response was "you have my full support." Was never able to admit his role in grossly delaying my ability to get pregnant. He omitted exam records that would prove he was delinquent. When I finally got my records and showed it to my new provider, he said something fishy was almost certainly going on over there and was concerned that he had never heard of Radjabi before. My biggest regret is sticking with this quack for as long as I did. I was a patient of Radjabi for 15 months with zero progress. New doctor's office is 10 times nicer, cleaner, much more professional... and I am finally receiving the care that every patient deserves.

originalText.text: Had a really great experience with Dr. Radjabi, Lauren and the entire Ferny team! They truly made my IVF journey special and provided me with an abundance of support all throughout. Thank you Ferny üíõ

text.text: Had a really great experience with Dr. Radjabi, Lauren and the entire Ferny team! They truly made my IVF journey special and provided me with an abundance of support all throughout. Thank you Ferny üíõ

originalText.text: Am beyond grateful to have met Doctor Radjabi and Lauren. I would give a million stars if I could. The doctor is super helpful, kind, caring, knowledgeable and professional. Always ready to answer all the questions and super positive. I felt safe and comfortable with him. He helped me a lot and am forever thankful! He has the experience and capability to diagnose you with any kind of issues in his line of expertise. Lauren is just an angel literally, I have never met a nurse who is passionate, caring and full of wishful thoughts for her patients. I highly recommend Doc Radjabi and his team!! He is an excellent, phenomenal professional, the best of his kind. Don‚Äôt think twice about it, you will be in amazing hands. I will miss them so much! Always at heart!

originalText.text: Staff was very nice and helpful. Dr Radjabi was very thorough on explaining the procedures and options. Office was clean and organized.

text.text: Staff was very nice and helpful. Dr Radjabi was very thorough on explaining the procedures and options. Office was clean and organized.

originalText.text:
I would like to start by saying I am veryy grateful that I finally  found the best of the best doctors. I will always and forever be grateful to Dr.Radjabi and Lauren. They have been with me since day one I stepped in that office. Never have I ever felt like they are ignoring my needs. Every time I would go for my appointments I felt loved and very well taken care like the first day.I will recommend this doctor to anyone who really want to start a family but doesn‚Äôt know where to start or what treatments they need. He got answers for every concern you have. He is very patient and never gets annoyed from asking questions. Nurse Lauren also is there for you and will answer any questions or unclarity you might have. Laure is an Angel ‚ù§Ô∏è. Please ignore all those negative comments because I guarantee you that those reviews are false.Guys let‚Äôs be realistic he is one doctor and has a lot of patients. All patients wants to be seen by him . How can he see all his patients at the same time? I never experienced any long wait. Try to be more understanding and be more patient . It is worth the wait! BELIEVE ME!!!!!
It took me forever to find a good fertility doctor. I went to so many doctors for my pcos. Every doctor would give me either birth control or Metformin and call it a day. Dr Radjabi didn‚Äôt waist my time prescribing me Metformin instead he had to go under a surgery that removed my cyst. I had pain constantly, but after Doctor Radjabi removed my cyst I felt like I was free again.I am very picky when it comes to women health and trust me you will never ever find a better doctor than him. The stuff is wonderful . The doctor and the nurse Lauren are good hearted people than genuinely care for their patients! If you have Pcos don‚Äôt waist your time , but go visit him and you will thank me Later ! Me and my Husband will forever be grateful to him and Lauren ‚ù§Ô∏è!!!! I would  write a whole essay on how thankful and grateful I am that I found Dr. Radjabi, nurse Lauren, and his staff.
Thank you for the hard work you do !!
